title: Here are the 14 SL-ers that I need...
author: Bocabirdman

posts.post_title: Here are the 14 SL-ers that I need...
posts.post_content:
As much as I would love to grab them all, I will have to limit myself to a fat fistful or so. I CAN afford all 36, just not all 36 AND a divorce lawyer:D I am looking for cards that present well.  Raw is my preference but slabbed would work. SGC 20/30 or the equivalent is the range I am looking for. SGC A could be an option if the card has good eye appeal.  Shoot me a PM and we will work something out. I will put this post on hold should I run out of money or if the wife blows a gasket.:D Thanks in advance to all who may respond.

Here is the Triple Dozen:
